name: Altmer
description: The racial skills of the High Elves reflect their magical affinity by increasing their spell damage, resource recovery, base magicka, and experience gain. These innate bonuses help define the race as proud and powerful spell casters.

skills.name: Highborn
skills.description: Increases your experience gain with the Destruction Staff skill line by 15%. Increases your experience gained by 1%.

skills.name: Spell Recharge
skills.description: When you activate a class ability, you restore 200/400/640 Magicka or Stamina, based on whichever is lowest. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds. When you are using an ability with a channel or cast time, you take 1%/2%/5% less damage.

name: Bosmer
description: The diversified racial skills of the Wood Elves reflect their woodland affinity. Improved archery, base stamina, stamina recovery, stealth detection, movement speed, reduced fall damage, and poison resistance make them dangerous foes and gifted hunters.

skills.name: Acrobat
skills.description: Increases your experience gain with the Bow skill line by 15%. Decreases your fall damage taken by 10%.

skills.name: Hunter's Eye
skills.description: Increases your stealth detection radius by 1/2/3 meter(s). Increases your movement speed by 3%/6%/10% and your Physical and Spell Penetration by 400/900/1500 for 6 seconds after you use Roll Dodge.

skills.name: Resist Affliction
skills.description: Increases your Max Stamina by 600/1200/2000 and Poison Resistance by 660/1320/2310. Gain immunity to the Poisoned status effect.

name: Khajiit
description: The racial skills of the feline Khajiit reflect their natural versatility and guile, giving them bonuses to pickpocketing, stealth, resource recovery, as well as base health, magicka, and stamina. These bonuses help them thrive in many ventures of life.

skills.name: Cutpurse
skills.description: Increases your experience gain with the Medium Armor skill line by 15%. Increases your chance to successfully pickpocket by 5%

skills.name: Robustness
skills.description: Increases your Health Recovery by 33/66/100 and your Stamina and Magicka Recovery by 25/50/85.

skills.name: Lunar Blessings
skills.description: Increase your Maximum Health, Magicka, and Stamina by 250/500/825.

skills.name: Feline Ambush
skills.description: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing by 3%/6%/10%. Decreases your detection radius in Stealth by 1/2/3 meter.
